aircraft.value: Heron Surveillance - AC-5076-773 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Instrument display flickering. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 19/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 21/12/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/12/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 22/12/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 26/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
